Articles.Content: I don't know about you guys but having moar parts would be great
I am exited to exploring the kerbal system as well as the new ones to come. This will be my first kerbal experience and so everything from the mun to Jeb excites me.
Im excited  for colonies and interstellar exploration, whenever it may come, however long, im excited nonetheless!
Even though my computer cant handle them, the new graphics look superb, so excited for that
I'm really looking forward to having the ability to use colonies to build new rockets that can then be launched onwards.
I'm excited to see  what sort of mods people will make for ksp 2
I can't wait to share the joy of building and exploration with my friends with the upcoming feature of Multiplayer along with colonies and interstellar travel!!!
Got to be the sound design. Truly a work of art. The countdown, ambient music, tires screeching, its got it all!
Im excited for procedural wings, clouds, interstellar and multiplayer!
I am excited for recreating historical missions like the Apollo Moon landings or the Space Shuttle!
Colonies

I'm excited to try out the new colour schemes and procedural wings to make an SR-71 Blackbird (with rapier engines for orbit capabilities). In the future I'm looking forward to what adventure mode will bring.

Also, it's my birthday today. Just sayin

Edited February 23, 2023 by Turbo Ben
Im excited for new kraken drives possibilities.

16 minutes ago, L0ck0n said:

Im excited for new kraken drives possibilities.

Please, don't wish for that.  Mercy, lol.  Just kidding

Edited February 23, 2023 by darthgently
Hype is real, can't wait to play

i can't wait for ksp 2 to be released so I can see the new renovated designs, new engines,new kerbal looks, can't wait to play multiplayer so i can play KSP with my family and friends and don't forget the cloud graphics   

Edited February 23, 2023 by what the heck bro
forgot a few things then i remembered

I'm excited to enjoy every minute, to see what's changed and what's the same, but better.  To find out what's new, and see it all for myself.

I'm excited to do what this game has been about since inception, and the greatest strength of our species.

I'm excited to explore.
I'm excited for blueprint mode

Hi,

What fascinates me in KSP, these KSP itself, the beauty of the graphics, the modes and designs of all the contributors, just huge!
Procedural wings! Time to try some in-atmosphere circumnavigations.
I am exited for interstellar travel and colonies. I want to make a cool water base like colony on Laythe.

I'm excited for the whole of the grand adventure that will be KSP2. Just like the grand adventure that KSP 1, it not only kickstarted my career in the games industry, but it ignited my love of spaceflight and science. I look forward to this adventure, no matter what it brings.
I am excited for the Mac edition
I'm excited for modding!
I'm excited for interstellar travel.
